dc:title: St. Joseph's House (Chrystie St.)
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Chronicles life at St. Joseph's House: repairs, grocery bills for "the line", managing subscriptions, endless mail and visitors. Asks St. Joseph to "impel" readers to help pay the grocery bills.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 692 1955-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
